home.title: ReRank AI
home.subtitle: From preventing ranking drops to boosting rankings, AI automatically identifies differences.
home.loginWithGoogle: Sign in with Google to get started
home.heroSubtitle:
Simply connect with Google Search Console, and AI will detect ranking drops and automatically suggest improvements.
Supports AI search (AIO) and new article suggestions.
home.ctaButton: Get Started Free with Google Account
home.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support video playback.

feature1.title: Automatic Rank Monitoring
feature1.description: Automatically checks rankings daily and immediately notifies you when drops are detected

feature2.title: Competitor Analysis
feature2.description: Automatically analyzes top-ranking competitor sites and identifies missing content

feature3.title: AI Improvement Suggestions
feature3.description: AI compares your articles with competitor articles and proposes specific improvements

feature4.title: New Article Suggestions
feature4.description: Automatically suggests new article titles and content that are effective for SEO based on Search Console data

step1.title: Connect with Google Search Console
step1.description: Sign in with your Google account and select a Search Console property

step2.title: Select an Article
step2.description: Select or enter the URL of the article you want to analyze

step3.title: AI Automatically Analyzes
step3.description: AI analyzes ranking data and proposes improvements based on differences with competitors

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose a plan that fits your needs

0.question: How many articles can I monitor with the free plan?
0.answer: The free plan allows you to monitor up to 3 articles. You can also run article analysis up to 7 times in total. New article suggestions are available once in total.

1.question: Is Google Search Console integration required?
1.answer: Google Search Console integration is required if you want to use the automatic monitoring feature. It is not required for manual article analysis. Integration can be easily set up by simply logging in with your Google account.

2.question: How do I receive notifications about ranking drops?
2.answer: When the ranking of a monitored article falls below the set threshold, you will receive an email notification immediately. The notification includes the cause of the ranking drop and improvement suggestions. We also support Slack notifications, which are available as a standard feature.

3.question: How does AI propose improvement suggestions?
3.answer: AI automatically analyzes articles from top-ranking competitor sites and identifies differences from your own articles. It specifically suggests missing headings, keywords, and content, and automatically generates rewritten drafts.

4.question: What is the new article suggestion feature?
4.answer: This feature automatically suggests new article titles and content that are effective for SEO based on Search Console data. Based on keyword gap analysis, it generates 10 article titles and content per suggestion.

5.question: Can I cancel anytime?
5.answer: Yes, you can cancel at any time. After cancellation, you can continue using the service until the end of the current month. Cancellation can be easily done from the "Plan Management" section in the dashboard.

6.question: Can I monitor multiple sites?
6.answer: Yes, the number of sites you can monitor varies by plan. The Starter plan allows 1 site, the Standard plan allows 3 sites, and the Business plan allows unlimited sites. You can link Search Console properties for each site. The number of monitored articles is limited to 10 for Starter, 50 for Standard, and 300 for Business.

7.question: Is my data stored securely?
7.answer: Yes, all data is encrypted and stored securely. Google Search Console authentication credentials are also securely managed, and we perform regular backups. We protect your data appropriately in accordance with our privacy policy.

home.noSuggestions: No suggestions yet. Click the "Generate Article Suggestions" button to generate suggestions.

chart.gscDataNote: Google search results only record data for pages displayed within the top 100. If there is a period when data is not retrieved, the ranking may have dropped below 100th place in search results.

Connected to ReRank AI.

settings.notificationTimeDescription: Notifications will be sent daily at this time (hourly only, default: 9:00 AM). Delivery may vary by a few minutes depending on system load.
settings.title: Settings
settings.goToDashboardToSetupDescription: Automatically track rankings and notify you with improvement suggestions when rankings drop
settings.languageDescription: The language of notification emails will be changed
settings.selectNotificationDestination: Please select a notification destination (DM or Channel)

alertSettings.title: Alert Settings
alertSettings.description: Customize rank change (drop and rise) detection conditions. Notifications are sent for both rank drops and rank rises.

dropConditions.title: Drop Detection Conditions
dropConditions.positionDropThresholdDescription: Notify when the current average position drops by this value or more compared to the comparison period average. Rank rises are also notified using the same threshold (e.g., if set to 2, notifications are sent for drops or rises of 2 positions or more). Can be set in 0.1 increments.
dropConditions.keywordDropThresholdDescription: Notify when any keyword related to the article drops to this position or below. If multiple keywords meet the condition, all of them will be included in the notification

comparisonPeriod.title: Comparison Period
comparisonPeriod.description: Use the average position over this period as the baseline to compare with the current average position

notificationFrequency.title: Notification Frequency
notificationFrequency.description: Select the notification frequency. Since Search Console data is updated once per day, notifications are sent during daily checks when rank drops are detected

consecutiveDropDays.title: Consecutive Drop Days
consecutiveDropDays.description: Notify when rank has dropped for this many consecutive days

minImpressions.title: Minimum Impressions
minImpressions.description: Only keywords with this many impressions or more will be included in notifications

notificationCooldownDays.title: Notification Cooldown
notificationCooldownDays.description: Do not send notifications for the same article within this number of days. If set to 0, the cooldown is disabled

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: ReRank AI (hereinafter referred to as "the Service") respects user privacy and strives to protect personal information. This Privacy Policy explains the information that the Service collects, uses, and protects.

accountInfo.title: 2.1 Account Information
accountInfo.description: When you log in with your Google account, the Service obtains the following information:
items: Email address
Name (display name)
Profile picture

gscData.title: 2.2 Google Search Console Data
gscData.description: For SEO rank monitoring, the Service accesses the following information through the Google Search Console API with user consent:
items: Search queries and ranking data
Clicks and impressions
Page URLs and performance data

usageData.title: 2.3 Usage Data
usageData.description: To improve the service, we may collect the following information:
items: Service usage
Feature usage frequency
Error logs

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
items: To provide SEO rank monitoring services
To send notifications about rank drops
To improve and develop the service
To provide customer support
To prevent fraud and ensure security
To comply with laws and regulations

dataSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.description: The Service does not share users' personal information with third parties except in the following cases:
items: When there is explicit user consent
When disclosure is required by law or court order
Disclosure to necessary service providers (such as cloud service providers) with appropriate safeguards

dataProtection.title: 5. Data Storage and Protection
dataProtection.content: The Service takes appropriate security measures to protect personal information. Data is encrypted and stored in secure cloud services.

userRights.title: 6. Your Rights
items: Access to personal information
Correction or deletion of personal information
Suspension of data processing
Account deletion
userRights.contact: If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us through the contact page.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: The Service may use cookies and similar technologies to provide and improve the service. You can restrict cookie usage through your browser settings.

thirdParty.title: 8. Third-Party Service Integration
thirdParty.description: The Service integrates with the following third-party services:
services: Google Search Console API (for SEO data retrieval)
Slack API (for sending notifications, only when user connects)
thirdParty.note: Each of these services has its own privacy policy.

policyChanges.title: 9. Changes to Privacy Policy
policyChanges.content: The Service may change this Privacy Policy as needed. Users will be notified of significant changes.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions or requests regarding privacy, please contact us through the contact page.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For questions, inquiries, or support regarding ReRank AI, please feel free to contact us. We typically respond within 2-3 business days.

faq.comingSoon: FAQ page is coming soon. Please wait for updates.

hours.title: Business Hours
hours.note: ‚Äª Inquiries received outside of these hours will be responded to starting from the next business day.

other.title: Other
items: If you encounter technical issues, including screenshots or error messages in your inquiry will help us respond quickly.
For account deletion requests, please contact us through the contact form or email.
For privacy-related inquiries, please also review our Privacy Policy.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of ReRank AI ("the Service"). Please read these Terms carefully before using the Service.

acceptance.title: 2. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please discontinue use of the Service.

service.title: 3. Service Description
service.description: The Service monitors SEO rankings by connecting to Google Search Console and sends notifications when rank drops are detected. Main features include:
features: Integration with Google Search Console API to fetch ranking data
Automatic detection of keyword ranking drops
Notifications for rank drops (email, Slack, etc.)

account.title: 4. Account
account.description: To use the Service, you must create an account. The following applies to accounts:
items: Accounts are created through Google account authentication
Users are responsible for ensuring the accuracy of account information
Users must promptly update account information if it changes
Users are responsible for managing their accounts
The Service may suspend or delete accounts if unauthorized use is suspected

payment.title: 5. Fees and Payment
payment.description: The following fees apply to the use of the Service:
items: Free and paid plans are available
Paid plans are processed through Stripe
Fees are charged monthly or annually based on the selected plan
Refunds are only available before service begins
Fees may be changed without prior notice

userConduct.title: 6. User Conduct
userConduct.description: Users must not engage in the following activities:
prohibited: Activities that violate laws or public order and morals
Activities that cause damage to the Service or third parties
Activities that interfere with the Service's servers or networks
Activities to obtain or use other users' account information
Activities that infringe on the Service's intellectual property rights
Activities to disassemble, decompile, or reverse engineer the Service's features
Activities to resell or redistribute the Service for commercial purposes
Other activities deemed inappropriate by the Service

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All intellectual property rights (copyrights, trademarks, patents, etc.) related to the Service belong to the Service or its licensors. Users may not copy, modify, distribute, or commercially use the Service's content.

limitation.title: 8. Disclaimer
limitation.content: The Service makes no warranties to users regarding the provision of services. The Service shall not be liable for any damages, including direct, indirect, consequential, or lost profits, arising from the provision of services.

termination.title: 9. Service Suspension and Termination
termination.content: The Service may suspend or delete user accounts and terminate service provision without prior notice if users violate these Terms or if the Service otherwise deems it necessary.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: The Service may change these Terms as necessary. Users will be notified of significant changes. Changes to the Terms take effect when posted on the Service's website.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us through the contact page.

pricing.value: Prices for each service plan are listed on the

additionalFees.label: Additional Fees
additionalFees.value: Consumption tax (included in price), communication fees (internet connection fees are borne by the customer)

paymentTiming.label: Payment Timing
paymentTiming.value: Immediate payment at time of service purchase

delivery.label: Delivery Time
delivery.value: Service is available immediately after payment processing is completed

returns.label: Returns & Cancellations
returns.value: Returns and cancellations after purchase are not accepted as this is a digital content and online service

cancellation.label: Cancellation Terms
cancellation.value: Cancellation is available at any time from your account page. Service remains available for the duration of the paid period even after cancellation. No pro-rated refunds

systemRequirements.label: System Requirements
systemRequirements.value: Internet connection required. Latest browser recommended

liability.label: Liability Disclaimer
liability.value: We are not responsible for any damages resulting from temporary suspension of service due to system failures or other reasons
